title: Penn State World Campus Programs Overview
content:
Penn State World Campus Academic Programs Overview

Total Majors: 40 undergraduate majors available
Total Minors: 20 minors available

Penn State World Campus offers 40 majors and 20 minors for online students.

Popular majors include: Business, Psychology, Criminal Justice, Information Sciences and Technology, Cybersecurity, Software Engineering, and Nursing.

Popular minors include: Business, Psychology, Economics, Information Sciences and Technology, and Organizational Leadership.

All programs can be completed 100% online.

title: All Penn State World Campus Majors
content:
Penn State World Campus offers 40 majors.

Complete list of majors:
1. Accounting, B.S.
2. Agribusiness Management, B.S.
3. Biobehavioral Health, B.S.
4. Business, B.S.
5. Criminal Justice, B.S.
6. Cybersecurity Analytics and Operations, B.S.
7. Digital Journalism and Media, B.A.
8. Digital Multimedia Design, B.Des.
9. Economics, B.A.
10. Economics, B.S.
11. Energy and Sustainability Policy, B.A.
12. Energy and Sustainability Policy, B.S.
13. Enterprise Technology Integration, B.S.
14. Finance, B.S.
15. Functional Data Analytics, B.S.
16. Health Policy and Administration, B.S.
17. History, B.A.
18. Human Development and Family Studies, B.S.
19. Information Sciences and Technology, B.S.
20. Integrated Social Sciences, B.S.
21. International Politics, B.A.
22. Labor and Human Resources, B.A.
23. Labor and Human Resources, B.S.
24. Law and Society, B.A.
25. Marketing, B.S.
26. Multidisciplinary Studies, B.A.
27. Nursing (RN to BSN), B.S.
28. Organizational and Professional Communication, B.A.
29. Organizational and Professional Communication, B.S.
30. Organizational Leadership, B.A.
31. Organizational Leadership, B.S.
32. Political Science, B.A.
33. Project and Supply Chain Management, B.S.
34. Psychology, B.A.
35. Psychology, B.S.
36. Recreation, Park, and Tourism Management, B.S.
37. Security and Risk Analysis, B.S.
38. Software Engineering, B.S.
39. Strategic Communications, B.A.
40. Turfgrass Science, B.S.

Total: 40 majors available.

title: Business Minor
content:
Minor: Business Minor
Department: BUSINESS
Credits Required: 19
Description: Study the fundamentals of business including accounting, marketing, management, and economics.
Key Courses: ACCTG 211, ACCTG 201, ACCTG 202, MGMT 301, MKTG 301W, ECON 102, ECON 104, CAS 404, CRIMJ 408, ENGL 419, ETI 420, HDFS 455, IST 402, IST 432, PSYCH 484

title: Criminal Justice Minor
content:
Minor: Criminal Justice Minor
Department: CRIMJ
Credits Required: 18
Description: Delve into the foundational concepts of criminal justice, as well as explore supporting topics and specializations within the field.
Key Courses: CRIMJ 100, CRIMJ 210, CRIMJ 220, CRIMJ 230, CRIM 406, SOC 406, CRIMJ 408, AFAM 409, SOC 409, CRIMJ 430, CRIMJ 435, CRIMJ 441, CRIMJ 450W, CRIMJ 465

title: Economics Minor

title: All Penn State World Campus Minors
content:
Penn State World Campus offers 20 minors.

title: Penn State General Education Overview
content:
Penn State General Education Requirements Overview

Total GenEd Credits Required: 45 credits

Categories:
1. Foundations
2. Knowledge Domains
3. Integrative Studies
4. Exploration

General Education ensures students develop skills in:
- Quantification (math and analytical thinking)
- Writing and Speaking (communication skills)
- Knowledge Domains (arts, humanities, natural sciences, social sciences)
- Health and Wellness
- Integrative Studies and Inter-Domain connections
